name: AXDatabaseBackupRestore
description: Creates/Restores a backup of an Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009/2012 database
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to create or restore a backup?

inputs.name: includeModelstoreDatabase
inputs.label: Include modelstore database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to include the model store database? (only AX 2012 R2 or higher)

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: backupFileName
inputs.label: Backup file path (.bak)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the database backup. (*.bak)

inputs.name: modelstoreBackupFileName
inputs.label: Model store backup file path (.bak)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the model store database backup. (*.bak)

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step.
